channel.title: AllenNLP on Alessandro Suglia
channel.description: Recent content in AllenNLP on Alessandro Suglia

item.title: Integrated Dialog bAbI+ dataset in ParlAI
item.description: The aim of the present pull-request is to add a new world in ParlAI based on the recently proposed dataset bAbI+. bAbI+ is an extension of the bAbI Task 1 dialogues with everyday incremental dialogue phenomena (hesitations, restarts, and corrections) which model the disfluencies and communication problems in everyday spoken interaction in real-world environments. See [1], [2] for additional information about the dataset.
